div.style: display:flex; flex-direction:column; justify-content: space-between; align-items: end; height:100vh;

div.class: row rounded-2 border border-light-subtle px-2 py-2

table.style: display:flex; border: 1px solid #000000; width: 100%; justify-content: end; align-items: end;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: center; gap: .5rem; padding: .2rem;

td.style: border:1px solid #e5e7e9; padding:4px; text-align:left; white-space:normal; word-break:break-word;

tr.td: Descuento global en ventas no sujetas:

t.t-foreach: o.line_ids.filtered( lambda l: l.tax_line_id and l.tax_line_id.tributos_hacienda_resumen_dte and l.tax_line_id.tributos_hacienda_resumen_dte.upper() not in excluded_codes )

span.t-esc: o.amount_tax + (o.total_no_sujeto + o.total_exento + o.total_gravado) - (o.descuento_exento + o.descuento_gravado + o.descuento_global) + o.iva_percibido_amount - o.retencion_renta_amount
